data.trans: Dốt nát, mù chữ, thất học
data.trans_hint: Một tỷ lệ đáng ngạc nhiên của dân số không biết chữ.
data.en_hint: A surprising percentage of the population are illiterate.
data.content_game_1: A surprising percentage of the population are illiterate.
data.answer_en_hint: A surprising percentage of the population are illiterate.

data.trans: Làm suy yếu, làm sút kém, làm hư hỏng, làm hư hại
data.trans_hint: Tiếng ồn lớn có thể làm sút kém thính lực của bạn.
data.en_hint: Loud noise can impair your hearing.
data.content_game_1: Loud noise can impair your hearing.
data.answer_en_hint: Loud noise can impair your hearing.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy mắc căn bệnh không thể cứu chữa.
data.content_game_1: He got an incurable disease.
data.answer_en_hint: He got an incurable disease.

data.trans: Về mặt trí tuệ, trí thức
data.trans_hint: Helen đang hy vọng tìm được một công việc yêu cầu nhiều hơn về mặt trí tuệ.
data.en_hint: Helen's hoping to find a job which is more demanding intellectually.
data.content_game_1: Helen's hoping to find a job which is more demanding intellectually.
data.answer_en_hint: Helen's hoping to find a job which is more demanding intellectually.

data.trans_hint: Gần một nửa dân số đang gặp vấn đề suy dinh dưỡng.
data.en_hint: Nearly half of the population is suffering from malnutrition.
data.content_game_1: Nearly half of the population is suffering from malnutrition.
data.answer_en_hint: Nearly half of the population is suffering from malnutrition.

data.trans_hint: Tất cả mọi người đã có tinh thần cao và kiên cường bất chấp thảm họa bão.
data.en_hint: The community was highly spirited and resilient despite a hurricane disaster.
data.content_game_1: The community was highly spirited and resilient despite a hurricane disaster.
data.answer_en_hint: The community was highly spirited and resilient despite a hurricane disaster.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy rất mê tín với sự đen đủi của con số 13.
data.en_hint: She is superstitious about the bad luck of number 13.
data.content_game_1: She is superstitious about the bad luck of number 13.
data.answer_en_hint: She is superstitious about the bad luck of number 13.

data.trans_hint: John phục hồi sau phẫu thuật chỉ trong chưa tới 10 ngày, và giờ đang rất khỏe mạnh.
data.en_hint: John recovered from his surgery in less than 10 days, and is now in the pink.
data.content_game_1: John recovered from his surgery in less than 10 days, and is now in the pink.
data.answer_en_hint: John recovered from his surgery in less than 10 days, and is now in the pink.

data.trans_hint: Một ngày, hoàn toàn bất ngờ, cô ta thông báo rằng sẽ rời đi.
data.en_hint: One day, out of the blue, she announced that she was leaving.
data.content_game_1: One day, out of the blue, she announced that she was leaving.
data.answer_en_hint: One day, out of the blue, she announced that she was leaving.
